title: Spice crusted roast rack of lamb with coriander and mint sauce
ingredients: ['1 1/2 tablespoons coriander seeds', '1 1/2 tablespoons caraway seeds', '1 1/2 tablespoons cumin seeds', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 (8 bone) rack of lamb', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon agave nectar or honey', '1 tablespoon rice wine vinegar', '1 lime, juiced', '2 cloves garlic', '50g fresh coriander', '50g fresh mint leaves', '125ml extra virgin olive oil']
